definitions.definition: The machines constituting a production apparatus, in a plant etc., collectively.
The working parts of a machine as a group.
The collective parts of something which allow it to function .
examples: All of the machinery of the law was brought to bear on the investigation.

definitions.definition: The literary devices used in a work, notably for dramatic effect.

main_definition: The machines constituting a production apparatus, in a plant etc., collectively.
secondary_definitions: The working parts of a machine as a group.
The collective parts of something which allow it to function .
( figuratively ) The literary devices used in a work, notably for dramatic effect.
